storyInfo:
Hoshiguma is powerless to stop Ch'en.
In Wei Yenwu's office, Rhodes Island finally reaches a deal with the Chief, thanks to some help from Fumizuki. Rhodes Island will assist Lungmen, and Ch'en.

attributes.content: Uptown Lungmen 7:20 P.M.
*Pant* *pant*...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...You're pretty serious about this.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Real unexpected. Never would've thought... that you'd be able to make me bleed.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: We... have never... been able to walk away... from our past.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hoshiguma, you've always been a part of this city. But... not me. I've always been running.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I don't think I'll ever be able to stand this place.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It turned into another one of these in the end.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I can't stop you. Go.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Sorry, Hoshiguma.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: After I'm gone, please go to the slums for me. The people there are panicked and confused. Someone from the L.G.D. has to protect them.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: If some Infected kids give you a toy bear...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Keep it. An Ursus girl named Misha taught them how to make those bears. She died, because we failed her.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Okay. I will.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I'm sorry. I owe you one.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I don't need your apologies. Honestly, you're no good at them.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hoshiguma...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...I think we're done here.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Go! And don't come back.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: ...Take care of yourself.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: 'Can't stand this place?'
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: ...How many people care about this city as much as you do?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Bullshit...
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Inspector Hoshiguma!
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: ...Huh? Inspector, y-you're hurt? Who could have...
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Oh, yes, we just saw, err, Madame Ch'en——
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Oh, that, sorry.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Do you guys have a second to talk?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Inspector... you're disobeying orders too?
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: ...I wouldn't put it that way.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Get out.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Yes, Lord Wei.
I told you... not to call me that.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: As you wish. We await your orders.
Miss Kal'tsit and Young Amiya, before you speak, could I have a word with him?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Yes, go ahead, Miss Fumizuki.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: All yours.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We've been together for years now, Wei Yenwu.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Why talk about this— Why now?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: One look in your eyes and I can tell what you're thinking.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: ...Fumizuki.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Now, now. I've always been able to tell.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: I know Lungmen means the world to you. I know all that you've given her. I know about the dreams you have for her.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: No, Fumizuki...
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: But this, today, this isn't what you want, is it?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Ah, gomen. I'm not referring to our current dilemma.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: What I mean is... this prosperity that you've given everything for.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: You lost two loved ones. Actually, I think you said it was three. Maybe dozens?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Surely you couldn't bear to lose your niece as well.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: She loathes the Shadow Guard. If I send them to retrieve her, she will fight them to the death.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: No, Wei Yenwu... That's not what I mean.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Won't you regret it? If you let them both die in some foreign city?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: So what if they're Infected? Are they not your nieces?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: If we had children of our own, is this how you would treat them...?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: All that I've done, I've done for the sake of our land. I never intended for Ch'en Hui-chieh to do my work for me.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: But that's how she is!
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: No. Keeping the truth from her only deepens the cut. It only makes her feel like she doesn't belong here...
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Your expectations of her, they're too distant, and too difficult.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: But can I stop, at this point?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I have struggled against the men behind me and the city below me for so long, and this is all I have to show for it.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Would Lungmen allow me to stop?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: That is what she wanted. To get to the source of our problems. She wanted to change this city into something completely unlike the city under my rule.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: All I did was teach her how to get there, what she would have to do, and what she would have to give up.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: All right, that's enough rationalizing. You're giving me a headache.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: I'll go bring her home myself. I won't sit back and watch her die.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: I will do what you cannot.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Nonsense! I won't allow it...!
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I have plans to bring her back. And you, Fumizuki, are not to set foot outside this building.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Oh? You'll stop me?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Damare, kono yarou!
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Whew.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Huh? Doctor, what did Miss Fumizuki say?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's been a long time since I've heard such angry Higashinese.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Have you forgotten who I am, Wei Yenwu?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Even I have my limits, Fumizuki.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Have you forgotten who you are?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Fumizuki...!
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: ...Doctor, I think...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Mr. Wei might really care for Miss Fumizuki?)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (The same may also go for Fumizuki. Maybe...)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Now then, on to our friends from Rhodes Island. How much will it cost for you to help Lungmen, and our Ch'en?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: I'll cover it myself.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You're really going to hire us like this, Miss Fumizuki?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I am.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: It may be improper to say, but my husband is not exactly in top form today.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Or I might say, our opponent's plans have gone beyond anything we might have predicted, and included all that he holds dear.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: They have a complete understanding of both Lungmen, and Wei Yenwu.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Fumizuki, that's enough!
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Who are you to say what's enough?!
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Doctor, name your price. I can pay.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: I understand everything you've said here, Miss Fumizuki. And money won't be necessary. But I need you two to hear me out.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Doctor.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Maybe this isn't the place to say it, but if I can speak freely, Lungmen needs some outside assistance.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Can I continue, Miss Fumizuki?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: By all means. I don't let words get to me.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: ...Nonsense...
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Rhodes Island is only a pharmaceutical company.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But the world is a tough place. It doesn't let up on any of us. Especially a pharmaceutical company like ours that tends to make a lot of enemies be it in business, geopolitics, or otherwise.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We wander the cracks between countries because we have no other choice.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: When all the forces of the world align to put pressure on us, we need our own special methods to handle them...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But if our methods are to work— We need the forces acting against us to have a shred of sense left in their thick skulls.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So when there comes a day like today, where anything could happen, Rhodes Island has to be ready with the right response.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Get to the point.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I have a proposal.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I hope it's a good one.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I'm not sure if I should be disclosing this information to you, Mr. Wei.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You must know, with Lungmen's strength and your talents, you could annihilate Rhodes Island with a snap of your fingers.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No matter how advanced our equipment may be, there is nothing we could do against your forces.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If we act against you, Rhodes Island is as good as dead.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Go on. Dr. Kal'tsit, Miss Amiya, rest assured I have no energy to direct at Rhodes Island anymore.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: So please, proceed.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: When we first met, Mr. Wei, you were very curious about our military capabilities.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I can admit now, as I just said, Rhodes Island is no match for Lungmen in this respect.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: However, no matter how strong a force may be, it can be limited by the circumstances it finds itself in. It's largely a difference of degree.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Even your men can't project power with their hands tied. Even if you step onto the battlefield personally, the enemy still has something to use against you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The truth is, a colleague of mine once saw the Duke of Kashchey at a fundraising banquet with his adopted daughter.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This wasn't a slave market or some noble bacchanal. It was an event for those who represent the many movers and shakers of our world.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Continue.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I'm sure you can guess what happened next, Mr. Wei. Many young people proved their value that night, with the ideas and theories that they espoused—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But Talulah did not. Neither my colleagues nor I ever expected that she would become the leader of Reunion.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: In fact... we should have realized that the Duke of Kashchey only shows himself when necessary, to do what is necessary. Otherwise, he stays out of sight.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kashchey won't tip his hand in exchange for assistance, and neither will Talulah. I'm sure you know their relationship much better than we do, Mr. Wei.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Duke of Kashchey never made her a slave or a hostage.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She is his successor.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Your observations confirm my suspicions, Dr. Kal'tsit. Talulah is Kashchey's successor.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Correct. Mr. Wei...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Duke of Kashchey knows what you have, and what you're capable of. Talulah may as well.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You can leave this in our hands now, Mr. Wei. We have what it takes to handle this situation.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Like Amiya told you before, the official agreement between Lungmen and Rhodes Island is over.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: By now, the Rhodes Island landship has left Lungmen's port. What we do from here on has nothing to do with Lungmen.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Is that acceptable, Amiya?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mr. Wei. We... won't concern ourselves with the future of Lungmen, or your personal business.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But all this is the result of someone conspiring to exploit the Infected, and we will fight it with all our might.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If you'll permit us to act, and if you can promise you won't act against us in any way——
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Then the battle to come is our battle, Rhodes Island's battle.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I won't rely on the Infected. I don't trust the Infected. The only difference between you and Reunion is that you haven't turned against Lungmen... yet.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: What was Reunion like before? Even if we don't remember, someone does. They weren't anything like this.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You can dress up your schemes in fancy words, just as Reunion can shout from the rooftops that they will be the ones to deliver the Infected from their fate. In the end, they still ended up being cannon fodder for Ursus.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: In short order, Ursus will snuff out the fire that is Reunion.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Will you be the next Reunion? Who can say? When will you bare your fangs and turn against us?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: What's more, I doubt you have the strength to deal with Kashchey's successor.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: That Duke of Kashchey... only Lungmen has successfully opposed him over all these years.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Mr. Wei, you intend to personally lead your forces to attack the Chernobog core city, correct?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Don't make blind conjectures.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: What you just told me, Mr. Wei, is revealing. You think you're the only one who can handle this situation.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's true that Lungmen has the raw power to do it, and you've also overcome the machinations of Ursus.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And this time, you intend to sacrifice yourself to nullify the declaration of war on Ursus.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As Miss Fumizuki said, you feel you've betrayed your principles, and you hope to end it all with your death.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I've made so many mistakes. My death can't pay for them all. I don't even know who I'd be paying.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Nevertheless, Mr. Wei, are you so certain that, after your death, no one will bear you any ill will?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Lungmen is strategically important to Yen. Thanks to my protection, it will continue to prosper.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I was referring to Lady Fumizuki.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Dr. Kal'tsit... Show some tact!)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit?! What are you saying?!
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: I meant what I said, Mr. Wei. I'm afraid your wife will suffer because of your actions. Even if you're dead, she is your widow. She'll still know everything you knew.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Since someone is forcing you to act against your will, I believe, this sort of thing... is to be expected.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I have a feeling that particular individual won't be so magnanimous.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That's enough, Dr. Kal'tsit! You're way out of line. I can't...
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: You're saying that even if I do this, I still won't be able to protect Fumizuki.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: And it may not end with Miss Fumizuki.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...I can go too. Death is the worst that can happen...
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Fumizuki!
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Speak, Dr. Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: For the sake of your beloved city... And your beloved people...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I am begging you, Lord Wei. Leave this to the experts.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We may be powerless against a standing army, but we know the Infected.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We know what they want, and what they don't.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Only the Infected can face the Infected.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So, what do you want? Leader of Rhodes Island, Dr. Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You're not a charity. Attacking the core city is tantamount to throwing an egg at a boulder. It will be ruinously expensive, and may be utterly futile.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You understand our position, Mr. Wei.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: At this point, it benefits us both to speak plainly.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: More than your agreement with our battle plan, Mr. Wei, we need your guarantee.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Considering you may change your mind in the future... We need your promise, for now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Because I believe that Lungmen and your family, and Madame Ch'en, are worth that promise.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We don't need your money, Miss Fumizuki. Your kindness and your attitude toward the Infected are enough for us to execute this operation free of charge.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Little rabbit...)
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Gives a thumbs-up)
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: I agree. Until the end of the Lungmen-Chernobog conflict, we, Lungmen, will not in any way interfere in Rhodes Island's affairs.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: And it looks to me like the good Dr. Kal'tsit has more yet to say.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Speak up. I can endure it, for the time being. Because I need Rhodes Island to save one very specific Infected.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: ...Then, I have another proposal.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Name your price.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Twenty years ago, Edward Artorius, father of Talulah Artorius, died here in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I would like Mr. Wei to lend us his remains.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit
